docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
• Install precommit 
    pip install pre-commit

  • Install dev dependencies 

    pre-commit install

  • Run Precommit against all files 

    pre-commit run --all-files

  • Install locally 

    pip install -e .

  • Start Developing !

docs.title: Run Commandline
docs.text:
pcodeprepare --admin 4

It would go to fieldmaps.io to get the adm4 polygons
